law.catch_line: Notwithstanding any other provision of law, the Treasurer may invest or reinvest unexpended or surpl...

text.section: The Treasurer shall set the conditions of the investment or reinvestment, including the term, the interest rate, and any service charge.
The Maryland Environmental Service shall repay the investment or reinvestment when the term that the Treasurer sets ends or, if sooner, when the Service receives the final federal funds.
